/** * ===================================== * ErrorFound ( errorData ) * * RETURNS: * Boolean true for anything other than 0. In other words, * if any error occurred at all, return True (1), otherwise return * False (0). * * PARAMETERS: * errorData = (JSON) output of Error custom function. * * DEPENDENCIES: * None * * HISTORY: * MODIFIED on 2022-AUG-10 by Matt Petrowsky editor@filemakermagazine.com * - Validating JSON as GetAsBoolean would take any positive value. * MODIFIED on 2022-AUG-01 by Matt Petrowsky editor@filemakermagazine.com * - Refactored to use JSON. * MODIFIED on 2013-NOV-22 by Daniel Smith dansmith65@gmail.com * - renamed to ErrorFound, update documentation * MODIFIED on 2013-OCT-11 by Daniel Smith dansmith65@gmail.com * - renamed from IsError to #IsError * - update documentation in script header * MODIFIED on 2012-NOV-21 by Daniel Smith dansmith65@gmail.com * - don't access $error variable directly * CREATED on 2012-NOV-20 Daniel Smith dansmith65@gmail.com * * REFERENCES: * https://github.com/filemakerstandards/fmpstandards/tree/master/Functions/Errors * ===================================== */
Let ( [ ~test = JSONGetElement ( errorData ; "error.code" ) ]; Left ( ~test ; 1 ) â‰ "?" and GetAsBoolean ( ~test ) )
